tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently gave birth to my beautiful baby girl, and I want to express my heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Karishma for their exceptional care throughout my pregnancy and delivery. Despite facing some complications during my pregnancy and at the time of delivery, Dr. Karishma made timely and correct decisions that ensured both my baby's and my safety.

Dr. Karishma's expertise, dedication, and compassionate approach provided immense comfort during those challenging moments. Their professionalism and swift actions made all the difference, and I am deeply grateful for their support and care. I highly recommend Dr. Karishma's to any expectant mother looking for a skilled and caring doctor.

Thank you, Dr. Karishma for being an outstanding doctor and for the safe arrival of our little bundle of joy.
reply_text: Thank you dear Ritu , may God bless our darling princess immensely ü•∞

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
I recently had the pleasure of being under the care of Dr. Karishma Bhatia for my normal delivery and postnatal care, and I cannot express my gratitude enough for the exceptional care I received.

I spent my first 2 trimesters in Mumbai where I got consultations from 9 to 10 gynaecologists (INHS Ashvini). Then I shifted to Delhi, many gynaecologists were suggested to me by my friends and relatives. After getting consulted with few other gynaecologists, I FINALLY got the satisfactory experience from Dr. KARISHMA BHATIA. From the very first appointment until the moment my baby was born, she demonstrated a true professionalism, ********** and compassion.
Her friendly and humble attitude made last weeks of my pregnancy easy. Really‚Ä¶ 
She's an amazing doctor and a wonderful person.
Her exceptional quality is she is not judgemental and she is available on call and responds quickly at any hour of the clock ! 
I can‚Äôt forget her response at MID-NIGHT when I got my labour pain, she keeps calling and texting me till she reached the hospital for my delivery.. where do we get a doctor like her ?

Her Clinic staff is really helpful. I am really grateful to Mr Joey and Miss Khushboo for the kind service they provided. 

I would highly recommend Dr. Karishma to any expectant mother seeking a compassionate, skilled* *** ************* gynaecologist. 
I am grateful for her expertise and support, and I would entrust my care to them again without hesitation.

Thank you Ma‚Äôam ! üòáüòä
reply_text: Thank you Sangeeta for sharing your story , you are extremely brave and you were very strong throughout your labour ! Always So happy to see the little angel! May God bless you üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Based on on-line reviews I decided to get appointment for pre-pregnancy consultation at Pristyn Care. I met Dr Karishma for the very first time and my husband found her **** ************* *** professional. After some tests she suggested me to go for Hysteroscopy. The entire diagnosis was well coordinated by Pristyn team and Dr. Karishma was very much supportive attentive throughout the procedure. The Pristyn team along with Dr Karishma were available at the Apollo Hospital where diagnosis was done. There was no tension for insurance claim because they are well tied-up with good quality hospital channels. She is such a positive, cheerful and friendly women that we decided not to visit to any other doctor for our purposes.  She always listens carefully and advise patiently. She is so friendly that me and my husband fell very much comfortable visiting her for any issue and we highly recommend everyone to consult her for one-stop treatment for any gyno related issues. We are very much sure that our association with Dr. Karishma would be fruitful. Thank you Dr. Karishma for all help and assistance.
reply_text: Thank you so much on behalf of the entire team at Pristyn care. It was a great honor to be able to help you out and really happy to see you doing well now ! Take care , it was a pleasure to meet such a sweet couple.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
When our 2nd child was three years old, my wife has got lots of stomach pain during periods both our childs were LSCS delivered and reason behind that pain was scar endometriosis that can be cured by surgery only. My wife was facing claustrofobia and anxiety problem so she can't be able to prepared herself for operation then his psycharist Dr Sheenam Goyal suggested us to consult this gynae Dr KARISHMA BHATIA. Before visiting Dr Karishma, we was already visited four gynae doctors but only Dr Karishma build my wife‚Äôs courage also boost her to get ready for surgery. Dr Karishma‚Äôs nature is so humble, down to earth, very cooperative and treat us like a family member always and whenever we want to know any little query about treatment medicine or anything else, she always response with positive way. We strongly recommend Dr Karishma Bhatia for any kind of gynae problem to every female.
Thank you so much Mam for your kind support and your guidance in every expect.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Having been married in 2017, we were childless till 2022. In between we consulted a few doctors but no positive results. One of doctors said that we had no option except IVF. Fortunately we consulted with Dr Karishma in November 2021. Having talked to us in detail, she advised to not go for IVF, and explained every aspects related to pregnancy. She ensured that both of us fine, recommended us a few medicine. My wife got pregnant in Dec 2022. Now we are blessed with a girl baby. Hats off to Karishma ma'am.
reply_text: Thank you so much for sharing your story üôÇ , may God bless you both and the little darling princess üíï

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are so happy to share our experiences. Last Jan we were here and it was a new city for us. My wife had an issue in the initial days of here pregnancy. Dr in Chennai asked us to be very careful through her pregnancy, as the cervix was very short when the third month scan was done. In Delhi we were looking for an experienced doctor to take it forward from the third month. We met Dr Karishma bhatia and she guided us all the way from there. After the 5th month scan  my wife's cervix was less than 14mm and Cervical cerclage was suggested to us by Dr Karishma and we went for it. All medicine and check was so critical after that. finally on 14th July we were blessed with a baby boy and happiness & satisfaction was so much that it can't be explained in words. we were so lucky to connect to a person like Dr Karishma bhatia. As not only a doctor she was guiding us like family. I strongly recommend here and request every one to have full trust here.
reply_text: Thank you so much for sharing your story. It was indeed a very happy moment when the little one came, coz Meenal did put in so much effort, following all the advises throughout the pregnancy !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Was having irregular and excessive bleeding during Covid times. I was scared to go out and visit a gynae. She answered all my queries patiently over the phone. I also consulted her earlier regarding my infertility treatments & now  I am blessed with a daughter. I will be grateful to her all my life. Trust me she is not just a fantastic doctor but also an expert healer
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. Covid was indeed a tough time , happy to be of help üôè, big congratulations and God bless your daughter immensely üòä

review: Dr Karishma Bhatia , Best doctor as per my experience. Very friendly and calm from nature.Treat her patients friendly. I met her in September 2020 regarding the problem of not conceiving the baby. After having a few tests i got to know that i had a PCOD problem. During my pregnancy Dr Karishma supported me a lot. With the great moral support of Dr Karishma i am now living a beautiful life with my babies.I would recommend Dr. Karishma Bhatia if anyone has the problem regarding pregnancy. review:
Dr Karishma is an excellent physician in every way. She understands the problem gives time to the patient and supports. She never forces me to get medicines from her or to do a test from her reference. 
We have been to many doctors before getting to Dr. karishma when we meet her we don‚Äôt  feel as if we have visited doctor. She never scared us about the baby she handles problems so well.
